Custom VIP Packages to the 2022 Italian Grand Prix

Our 2022 Italian Grand Prix travel packages are custom crafted for each individual traveler, allowing our guests to experience this thrilling event in true luxury. We’ll ensure your bespoke travel itinerary is perfect for you, complete with inclusions like Milan’s top luxury accommodations, your choice of race viewing including premium grandstand seating and exclusive hospitality paddocks, unique access that can include pit tours and driver appearances, private excursions, personal concierge services, and much more. After the race, you can keep the excitement going long into the night by mingling with pilots, fashion models and other VVIPs at the ultimate after party.

Complete 2022 Italian Grand Prix packages available from $5,095 (premium grandstand seating) or $12,335 (exclusive hospitality) per person, based on double occupancy.

About the 2022 Italian Grand Prix

One of the most anticipated and longest-running races on the F1 circuit, the Italian Grand Prix plays out on one of the fastest tracks in the world. Experience the race’s extensive history along with Scuderia Ferrari’s passionate fans — the Tifosi — and you will quickly understand why this is one of the most popular F1 races on the circuit. Add to that the alluring city of Milan and you have a combination that’s hard to beat. This sophisticated destination may be one of the most modern cities in the country but it also offers more than 26 centuries of fascinating history, providing the best of both worlds to its visitors.
